Text:
We the Best Forever is the upcoming fifth studio album by DJ Khaled. It will be 
released under We the Best Music Group, Terror Squad Entertainment, Cash Money Records 
and Universal Motown on July 19, 2011 instead of June 28, 2011 It will be his first 
album to be released on a major label, his first four albums being released on the 
independent label Koch Records, which later changed its name to E1 Music...
